ygData.subject: Hakibuscon

Sorry about that last message with Hakibuscon and Decadel.  I forgot to put
Hakibuscon in there.

::Hakibuscon::

	Hakibuscon decided to go invade the Ark, the Maximal ship.  He was great
at being stealthy.

	He sped there in vehicle mode, and then transformed into robot mode, only
to see the other Predacons attacking.  

	He went up to Paralysis and said, "Listen, keep attacking the base!!! 
That will make them come out and then I plan to go in cloaked and find
information, and then attack from the inside!!"
